Uses of Package
at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.gamepad

  • Packages that use at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.gamepad 
    Package Description
    at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs  
    at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.gamepad  
  • Classes in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.gamepad used by at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs 
    Class and Description
    GamepadManager
    Searches for gamepads in the list of connected input-devides upon instantiation, instantiates GamepadConnections for each one and adds those to GamepadManager.gamepadConnections.
    It also provides methods to find Gamepads, print a list of all Gamepads and test a Gamepad.
    Listeners are able to register themselves with the ServerConnection to get updated about sending and receiving data as well as connection updates.
  • Classes in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.gamepad used by at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.gamepad 
    Class and Description
    ControllerMapping
    An abstract class to provide some general means to access most of a controllers buttons and axes, regardless of the type or brand of controller.
    GamepadConnection
    Being a concrete implementation of the Connection class, this class basic function is to communicate with a remote device connected to the RMCS - a gamepad in this case.
    This implementation reads data from a gamepad, creates IControlData-sets accordingly (if in control) and puts them on the Connection.controlDataQueue.
    It is also able to send control-change-requests to the main-thread.
    If there is more than one gamepad connected to the RMCS, one gamepad cannot be in control of the DriveControlData and the CameraControlData at the same time.
    GamepadInput
    A class to set and store the gamepads last inputs to control the car.
